text: Berdyansk Airport (, ) is an airport in Berdyansk, Ukraine. The airport is located north of the city.General Airport Information ==Incidents and Accidents== * On 19 June 1987, Aeroflot Flight 528, a Yakovlev Yak-40 (CCCP-87826) was approaching airport with tailwind in a heavy rain shower and touched down at a high speed. A go-around was initiated, but later aborted. The aircraft overran the runway, struck some obstacles and caught fire, killing eight aboard. The aircraft was written off.Yak-40 Incident ==References== Category:Airports in Ukraine Category:Airports established in 1975
